ai-tha-ap187:1.1_0: A person who slays their mother
ai-tha-ap187:1.2_0: I was drunken on the rainy season.
ai-tha-ap187:2.4_0: taught the Kinsman of the world.
ai-tha-ap187:3.2_0: and they were disciples of Buddha.
ai-tha-ap187:3.3_0: all the bowls filling the bowls.
ai-tha-ap187:4.2_0: you’ve been accused like a tortoise:
ai-tha-ap187:4.4_0: Would I have a bad destination?
ai-tha-ap187:5.3_0: they came to a good place.
ai-tha-ap187:7.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Isisiṅga.
ai-tha-ap187:8.1_0: for the fifth time Isigili (whole) five Elders
